Package routerrental_package

Class SystemIformationHolder

java.lang.Object
routerrental_package.SystemIformationHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
SystemInformationPrinter, SystemManager, UserSystemManager
abstract class SystemIformationHolder
extends java.lang.Object
Class that has all the information needed by the system. All inheriting classes applies Single-Responsibility, Open-Closed and Liskov Substitution principle.
See Also:
Java - The HashMap Class
